DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare effect pre-procedural ketorolac ibuprofen immediate post-procedural pain score patient undergo first trimester suction curettage local anesthesia . Our primary hypothesis IM ketorolac compare oral ibuprofen result approximate 30 % reduction pain score 21-point numerical rating scale immediately procedure . Secondary hypothesis include : - Pain score 21-point scale also significantly low ketorolac group immediately cervical dilation 15 minute post-procedure . - Fewer patient ketorolac group rate pain `` severe '' subjective pain rating scale . - Patients ketorolac group satisfy pain control . - Side effect similar group .
DOC.brief_title: Intramuscular Ketorolac Versus Oral Ibuprofen Pain Relief First Trimester Suction Curettage
DOC.criteria: Women age 18 old seek suction curettage Planned Parenthood League Massachusetts ( PPLM ) Gestational age less equal 11+6 , confirm ultrasound Eligible suction curettage accord PPLM protocols Choice local anesthesia Choice IV sedation pain control Hypersensitivity NSAIDs lidocaine Contraindications NSAIDs : Active renal disease Active hepatic disease Gastric ulcer disease gastritis Longterm NSAID aspirin use Bleeding disorder NSAIDs take < 8 hour prior procedure Need cervical ripen either misoprostol mechanical priming agent ( laminaria/Dilapan ) Longterm narcotic use Unable unwilling complete require study procedure Previous participation study
